events.message: The customer submitted a claim reporting a vehicle collision that occurred at an intersection last night.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords related to car collision and damages.
An agent with expertise in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the customer's vehicle collision case.
Customer was notified that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company.
The agent requested the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and witness statements to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, pictures of the damaged car, and witness contact info.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to establish fault and verify the extent of damage on the car.
Investigation concluded that the collision was caused by another driver, confirming the customer's vehicle sustained significant damage.
Insurance company proposed a settlement offer covering repair costs and a rental vehicle while repairs are completed.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the quick handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved based on the terms agreed upon in the proposed settlement offer.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover the vehicle repairs and other related expenses under the approved claim.
The vehicle damage claim was closed after full payment was processed and the customer confirmed repairs were completed.
